verses.verse: He that <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> in the secret <S%H5643>place<s%> of the most <S%H5945>High<s%> shall <S%H3885>abide<s%> under the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>
I will <S%H559>say<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> He is my <S%H4268>refuge<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress:<s%> my <S%H430>God;<s%> in him will I <S%H982>trust.<s%>

Surely <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee from the <S%H4480>snare<s%> <S%H6341><s%> of the <S%H3353>fowler,<s%> and from the noisome <S%H4480>pestilence.<s%> <S%H1698><s%> <S%H1942><s%>

He shall <S%H5526>cover<s%> thee with his <S%H84>feathers,<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H3671>wings<s%> shalt thou <S%H2620>trust:<s%> his <S%H571>truth<s%> shall be thy <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H5507>buckler.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> for the <S%H4480>terror<s%> <S%H6343><s%> by <S%H3915>night;<s%> nor for the <S%H4480>arrow<s%> <S%H2671><s%> that <S%H5774>flieth<s%> by <S%H3119>day;<s%>

Nor for the <S%H4480>pestilence<s%> <S%H1698><s%> that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in <S%H652>darkness;<s%> nor for the <S%H4480>destruction<s%> <S%H6986><s%> that <S%H7736>wasteth<s%> at <S%H6672>noonday.<s%>

A <S%H505>thousand<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> at thy <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H6654><s%> and ten <S%H7233>thousand<s%> at thy right <S%H4480>hand;<s%> <S%H3225><s%> but it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> come <S%H5066>nigh<s%> <S%H413><s%> thee.
Only <S%H7535><s%> with thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shalt thou <S%H5027>behold<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H8011>reward<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which is my <S%H4268>refuge,<s%> even the most <S%H5945>High,<s%> thy <S%H4583>habitation;<s%>
There shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H579>befall<s%> <S%H413><s%> thee, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall any <S%H5061>plague<s%> come <S%H7126>nigh<s%> thy <S%H168>dwelling.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> he shall give his <S%H4397>angels<s%> <S%H6680>charge<s%> over thee, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> thee in <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
They shall bear thee <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> their <S%H3709>hands,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> thou <S%H5062>dash<s%> thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> against a <S%H68>stone.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H1869>tread<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7826>lion<s%> and <S%H6620>adder:<s%> the young <S%H3715>lion<s%> and the <S%H8577>dragon<s%> shalt thou trample under <S%H7429>feet<s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> he hath set his <S%H2836>love<s%> upon me, therefore will I <S%H6403>deliver<s%> him: I will set him on <S%H7682>high,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he hath <S%H3045>known<s%> my <S%H8034>name.<s%>

He shall call <S%H7121>upon<s%> me, and I will <S%H6030>answer<s%> him: <S%H595>I<s%> will be <S%H5973>with<s%> him in <S%H6869>trouble;<s%> I will <S%H2502>deliver<s%> him, and <S%H3513>honor<s%> him.
With <S%H753>long<s%> <S%H3117>life<s%> will I <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> him, and <S%H7200>show<s%> him my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
